author: chinthaka
msg: Improving the Axis2 engine for fault handling together with some improvements to the test. The test is not complete.

author: zheng
msg: Fixed bugs in DefaultPortletPreferencesService (stored preferences not cloned, thus not protected from being directly accessed). Fixed bugs in testsuite (reset not followed by store when cleaning preferences). Added test for calling PortletPreferences.store() within render().

author: dicka
msg: Minor modification to avoid variable scoping issue when using MS VC++ 6.0

author: chinthaka
msg: Improving SOAPFault detail to serialize more than one child

author: rineholt
msg: Change sample poms that are war packages to not include the tuscany infrastructure.
